column1: Smoque BBQ////Let me make this review short and sweet. I've lived in Alabama
column4: so I've had my fair share of really good BBQ. I don't know what Smoque is. It's not BBQ. It's trying really hard to be bbq
column7: and the 'smoke' flavor are just not there. If you're from Chicago you might like it
column8: but if you've ever had real bbq before
column9: this will disappoint (especially cuz it's a bit pricey).
